languages.text: "Мне неведомо это. Если сей механизм был отмечен скверной... возможно ли?.." {n}Мехадендрит техножреца беспокойно дергается над приборной панелью.{/n} "Если ересь завладела машинным духом, поправ все заветы Омниссии, дух мог обезуметь и даже присвоить себе имя... но это лишь моя гипотеза".

traits.locale_text: "Мне неведомо это. Если сей механизм был отмечен скверной... возможно ли?.." {n}Мехадендрит техножреца беспокойно дергается над приборной панелью.{/n} "Если ересь завладела машинным духом, поправ все заветы Омниссии, дух мог обезуметь и даже присвоить себе имя... но это лишь моя гипотеза".
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: "That is a mystery to me. If this mechanism truly is tainted, then... could it be?" {n}The Tech-Priest's mechadendrite jitters anxiously over the control panel.{/n} "If heresy truly has taken hold of this machine spirit and scorned the Omnissiah's every tenet, then the spirit's madness could be such that it has chosen a name for itself... but that is nothing more than my hypothesis."
languages.original_text: "Мне неведомо это. languages.text: 「それは私にとっても謎です。もし、このメカニズムが本当に汚染されているのであれば、あるいは…それが可能なのでしょうか？」{n}技術司祭の機械触手は、制御パネルの上で不安げに震えた。{/n}「もし、ことの機械精霊が真に異端のもので、万機神のすべての教義を軽んじているのなら、その精神の狂気は自分自身の名前を選んだかもしれない…しかし、これは私の仮説に過ぎません」
languages.original_text: "That is a mystery to me. If this mechanism truly is tainted, then... could it be?" {n}The Tech-Priest's mechadendrite jitters anxiously over the control panel.{/n} "If heresy truly has taken hold of this machine spirit and scorned the Omnissiah's every tenet, then the spirit's madness could be such that it has chosen a name for itself... but that is nothing more than my hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: 「それは私にとっても謎です。もし、このメカニズムが本当に汚染されているのであれば、あるいは…それが可能なのでしょうか？」{n}技術司祭の機械触手は、制御パネルの上で不安げに震えた。{/n}「もし、ことの機械精霊が真に異端のもので、万機神のすべての教義を軽んじているのなら、その精神の狂気は自分自身の名前を選んだかもしれない…しかし、これは私の仮説に過ぎません」
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: « Je l'ignore. Si ce mécanisme est véritablement souillé, se pourrait-il que...? » {n}La mécadendrite du technoprêtre remue anxieusement au-dessus du panneau de contrôle.{/n} « Si l'hérésie s'est emparée de cet esprit de la machine et a bafoué la doctrine de l'Omnimessie, peut-être ce mécanisme est-il en proie à une folie telle qu'il s'est choisi un nom... Mais ce n'est que pure conjecture de ma part. »
languages.original_text: "That is a mystery to me. If this mechanism truly is tainted, then... could it be?" {n}The Tech-Priest's mechadendrite jitters anxiously over the control panel.{/n} "If heresy truly has taken hold of this machine spirit and scorned the Omnissiah's every tenet, then the spirit's madness could be such that it has chosen a name for itself... but that is nothing more than my hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'ignore. Si ce mécanisme est véritablement souillé, se pourrait-il que...? » {n}La mécadendrite du technoprêtre remue anxieusement au-dessus du panneau de contrôle.{/n} « Si l'hérésie s'est emparée de cet esprit de la machine et a bafoué la doctrine de l'Omnimessie, peut-être ce mécanisme est-il en proie à une folie telle qu'il s'est choisi un nom... Mais ce n'est que pure conjecture de ma part. »
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: “我也并不清楚。如果这台机器真的遭到了腐化……不过，真的会发生这种事情吗？”{n}技术神甫的机械触须焦虑地颤动着。{/n}“如果异端邪说违反了欧姆尼塞亚的神圣律法，真的控制了这台机器的机魂，那‘诺莫斯’很可能是这个发疯的机魂给自己取的名字……但这仅仅是我的猜测而已。”
languages.original_text: "That is a mystery to me. If this mechanism truly is tainted, then... could it be?" {n}The Tech-Priest's mechadendrite jitters anxiously over the control panel.{/n} "If heresy truly has taken hold of this machine spirit and scorned the Omnissiah's every tenet, then the spirit's madness could be such that it has chosen a name for itself... but that is nothing more than my hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: “我也并不清楚。如果这台机器真的遭到了腐化……不过，真的会发生这种事情吗？”{n}技术祭司的机械触须焦虑地颤动着。{/n}“如果异端邪说违反了欧姆尼塞亚的神圣律法，真的控制了这台机器的机魂，那‘诺莫斯’很可能是这个发疯的机魂给自己取的名字……但这仅仅是我的猜测而已。”
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: «Es un misterio para mí. Si este mecanismo está realmente mancillado... ¿podría ser?». {n}La mecadendrita del tecnosacerdote se agita con ansia sobre el panel de control.{/n} «Si es cierto que la herejía se ha apoderado de este espíritu máquina y ha rechazado los mandamientos del Omnissiah, no es imposible que, en su locura, haya tomado un nombre propio... pero no es más que una hipótesis».
languages.original_text: "That is a mystery to me. If this mechanism truly is tainted, then... could it be?" {n}The Tech-Priest's mechadendrite jitters anxiously over the control panel.{/n} "If heresy truly has taken hold of this machine spirit and scorned the Omnissiah's every tenet, then the spirit's madness could be such that it has chosen a name for itself... but that is nothing more than my hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: «Es un misterio para mí. Si este mecanismo está realmente mancillado... ¿podría ser?». {n}La mecadendrita del tecnosacerdote se agita con ansia sobre el panel de control.{/n} «Si es cierto que la herejía se ha apoderado de este espíritu máquina y ha rechazado los mandamientos del Omnissiah, no es imposible que, en su locura, haya tomado un nombre propio... pero no es más que una hipótesis».
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: "Das ist ein Mysterium. Wenn dieser Mechanismus wirklich verdorben ist, dann ... ist das möglich?" {n}Der Mechadendrit des Techpriesters zittert nervös über dem Bedienfeld.{/n} "Wenn wirklich die Ketzerei von diesem Maschinengeist ergriffen hat und er sämtlichen Grundsätzen des Omnissiah abgeschworen hat ... dann ist der Geist vielleicht derart wahnsinnig, dass er sich einen Namen gegeben hat. Doch das ist nur eine Hypothese."
languages.original_text: "That is a mystery to me. If this mechanism truly is tainted, then... could it be?" {n}The Tech-Priest's mechadendrite jitters anxiously over the control panel.{/n} "If heresy truly has taken hold of this machine spirit and scorned the Omnissiah's every tenet, then the spirit's madness could be such that it has chosen a name for itself... but that is nothing more than my hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein Mysterium. Wenn dieser Mechanismus wirklich verdorben ist, dann ... ist das möglich?" {n}Der Mechadendrit des Techpriesters zittert nervös über dem Bedienfeld.{/n} "Wenn wirklich die Ketzerei von diesem Maschinengeist ergriffen hat und er sämtlichen Grundsätzen des Omnissiah abgeschworen hat ... dann ist der Geist vielleicht derart wahnsinnig, dass er sich einen Namen gegeben hat. Doch das ist nur eine Hypothese."
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: "Benim de aklım ermiyor. Bu mekanizma sahiden lekelendiyse... Olabilir mi?" {n}Tekno Rahip'in mekadentriti, kontrol panelinin üzerinde telaşla geziyor.{/n} "Bu makine ruhu hakikaten kâfirliğe yenik düşüp Hermesih'in tüm ilkelerini tahkir ettiyse aklını, kendine isim koyacak kadar yitirmiş olabilir... En azından benim fikrim bu yönde."
languages.original_text: "That is a mystery to me. If this mechanism truly is tainted, then... could it be?" {n}The Tech-Priest's mechadendrite jitters anxiously over the control panel.{/n} "If heresy truly has taken hold of this machine spirit and scorned the Omnissiah's every tenet, then the spirit's madness could be such that it has chosen a name for itself... but that is nothing more than my hypothesis."

traits.locale_text: "Benim de aklım ermiyor. Bu mekanizma sahiden lekelendiyse... Bu mümkün mü?" {n}Tekno Rahip'in mekadentriti, kontrol panelinin üzerinde telaşla geziyor.{/n} "Bu makine ruhu hakikaten kâfirliğe yenik düşüp Hermesih'in tüm ilkelerini tahkir ettiyse aklını, kendine isim koyacak kadar yitirmiş olabilir... En azından benim fikrim bu yönde."
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630
